# Krona Pie Chart 

Now we're going to visualise our results. 

From Tools select "Krona pie chart": 

1.  Type of input data: Tabular 
2.  Input file: Krakentools: Convert kraken report on collection
3.  Provide a name for the basal rank: Bacteria 

And select run.
